alert.note: Alert for Bledsoe; Hamilton; Meigs; Rhea (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 27 at 3:27PM CDT until September 27 at 4:15PM CDT by NWS Knoxville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Morristown has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Rhea County in east Tennessee... Bledsoe County in east Tennessee... West central Meigs County in east Tennessee... Northeastern Hamilton County in east Tennessee... * Until 515 PM EDT/415 PM CDT/. * At 427 PM EDT/327 PM CDT/, a severe thunderstorm was located near Pikeville, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Dayton, Pikeville, Graysville, Evensville, Sale Creek, Old Washington, Brayton, Mount Crest, Old Cumberland, and Fall Creek Falls State Park. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
